meanings: wish, hope, want, (formal) desire, (간절히) long for, (기대하다) look forward to
live in hopes of better fortune

meanings.meaning: (fly) by the seat of your pants

vlive.korean: 모든 사람에게 모모의 '몬지알지'가 통하기를 바라고... I hope you're known for Monjialji to all the people... 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV ‘트둥엔터테인먼트 미션! 결재를 받아라!’
vlive.english: I hope you're known for Monjialji to all the people...

vlive.korean: '그래 그거 바라고 왔다! 여기 있는 내 눈, 코, 입 이거 다 아빠가 만든 거잖아 아빠가 한 거잖아!' "Yeah! I came with that in mind! My eyes, nose, lips! You made all of this! You did it!" 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연락👋🏼
vlive.english: "Yeah! I came with that in mind! My eyes, nose, lips! You made all of this! You did it!"

vlive.korean: 계속해서 바라고 열망하자! Let us continue to hope and yearn! 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 새해부터 에이티니에게 받은 고마운 선물♥️
vlive.english: Let us continue to hope and yearn!

vlive.korean: 제가 바라고 원하던 제품이 바로 이런 거예요! This is exactly the kind of product that I wanted! 듣기 View video SEOUL EONNI : 아, 리얼? [갓신상 필링패드 토닝패드] 솔직 리뷰! AHA, BHA, PHA, (나눔이벤트)
vlive.english: This is exactly the kind of product that I wanted!

vlive.korean: 꼭 레이스에도 참여할 수 있길 바라고 오늘 우선 너무 재밌었습니다 감사합니다~ I hope that we can in the race. It was so much fun. Thank you. 듣기 View video ITZY : I SEE ITZY(있지) EP.21
vlive.english: I hope that we can in the race. It was so much fun. Thank you.

examples.korean: We were hoping we could go sledging. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 썰매를 탈[타러 갈] 수 있기를 바라고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were hoping we could go sledging. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He hopes one day to surpass the world record. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 언젠가는 세계 기록을 뛰어넘게 되기를 바라고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He hopes one day to surpass the world record. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The party wants her as leader. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 정당은 그녀가 대표가 되기를 바라고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The party wants her as leader. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She is hoping her US debut will be the first step on the road to fame and fortune. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 미국 데뷔 앨범이 부와 명예로 가는 길의 첫 걸음이 되기를 바라고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is hoping her US debut will be the first step on the road to fame and fortune. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We are hoping for good weather on Sunday. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 일요일에 날씨가 좋기를 바라고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We are hoping for good weather on Sunday. Add to Wordbook
